name: harness-mes
description: HARNESS MES - Manufacturing Execution System for Wire Harness Production

scripts.kill: taskkill /F /FI "WINDOWTITLE eq turbo" >nul 2>&1 & (FOR /F "tokens=5" %P IN ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3002 ^| findstr LISTENING') DO taskkill /F /PID %P >nul 2>&1) & (FOR /F "tokens=5" %P IN ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3003 ^| findstr LISTENING') DO taskkill /F /PID %P >nul 2>&1) & echo Killed dev servers
